title: Minecraft Blaze Rods: How Many You Need to Beat the Game

steps.title: You need at least 5 blaze rods to beat the game.
steps.content: You need at least 5 blaze rods to beat the game. To reach The End in Minecraft, you need to place 9 Eyes of Ender on an Ender Portal . Eyes of Ender are crafted from two blaze powders and one ender pearl. One blaze rod can be used to craft two blaze powder. It is recommended that you collect 8 to 20 blaze rods. Five is the minimum you need to |beat the game .

steps.title: Kill blazes to get blaze rods.
steps.content: Kill blazes to get blaze rods. Blazes can be found in The Nether. To get to The Nether, you will need to build a nether portal . Once in The Nether, blazes spawn in Nether Fortresses. Each blaze has a 50% chance of dropping a blaze rod when killed by a player.

steps.title: Blaze rods and blaze powder can be used for crafting and fuel.
steps.content: Blaze rods and blaze powder can be used for crafting and fuel. In addition to making Eyes of Ender, blaze rods can be used as fuel in a furnace . Blaze powder is required as fuel to brew potions in a brewing stand . Both blaze rods and blaze powder can be used to craft items.

steps.title: Blaze Powder.
steps.content: Blaze Powder. Use a crafting table to craft two blaze powders from one blaze rod. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Eye of Ender.
steps.content: Eye of Ender. Eyes of Ender can be crafted from one Ender Pearl and one blaze powder using a crafting table. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Brewing Stand.
steps.content: Brewing Stand. A brewing stand can be crafted from a blaze rod and three cobblestone blocks using a crafting table. [3] X Research source

steps.title: End rod.
steps.content: End rod. An end rod is a decorative light source. It can be crafted from one blaze rod and one popped chorus fruit using a crafting table.

steps.title: Fire charge.
steps.content: Fire charge. A fire charge can be used as a single-use fire starter or shot as a fireball from a dispenser. They can be crafted from one blaze powder, one coal or charcoal, and one gunpowder using a crafting table. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Magma cream.
steps.content: Magma cream. Magma cream is used to brew a Potion of Fire Resistance and to build magma blocks. It can be crafted from one blaze powder and one slime ball using a crafting table.

steps.title: Mundane Potion.
steps.content: Mundane Potion. A mundane potion is used as a base for other potions. It can be crafted from a blaze powder and a water bottle using a brewing stand.

steps.title: Potion of Strength.
steps.content: Potion of Strength. A Potion of Strength can be brewed from an Awkward potion and a blaze powder using a brewing stand.
